reviews.title: lovely city
reviews.text: was pleasantly surprised how the secret garden hostel in kazimierz was quiet at night, good priced and with free internet, tea/coffee.
Room was clean with comfortable bed, and shower only across the way from bedroom. No queues for shower/toilet so was happy to pay for a room with these facilities.

reviews.title: Secret Garden is great value

reviews.text: The Secret Garden Hostel is a very clean and welcoming place to stay. Located approx a 20 minute walk (or 5 mins by tram) south of the Old Town, this accommodation offers clean and spacious rooms with shared bath / toilet facilities. The facilities are excellent - local information, free internet, TV room. Adequate breakfast and free tea / coffe throughout the day is offered.
reviews.title: Excellent Hostel
